text: Paola Ramírez Vargas (born 23 February 1987) is a Costa Rican volleyball player. She was part of the Costa Rica women's national volleyball team at the 2006 FIVB Volleyball Women's World Championship, 2008 Women's Pan-American Volleyball Cup, 2009 Women's Pan-American Volleyball Cup, and 2013 Women's Pan-American Volleyball Cup. She played for Universidad Estatal a Distancia. == References == == Other websites == * Paola Ramírez Vargas - Costa Rica BVB Category:1987 births Category:Costa Rican sportspeople Category:Volleyball players
title: Paola Ramírez
